description:
This course covers the role and responsibilities of a Business Analyst along with details on the Business Change Lifecycle and the Holistic Business System.

This course aligns with part of the syllabus for the Business Analysis Practice examination by the British Computer Society (BCS) and can be used as a revision guide for those who are taking that examination. However this only covers the part of the syllabus for that course.

The course is also useful for those not taking the exam who wish to learn more about the Business Analyst role.

The course covers the responsibilities of investigating the business situation, identifying and evaluating options for improvement, defining requirements, and implementation and beyond.
title: Learn the Business Analyst's Role in Business Change
